title: The Hibbert Journal
additional-note: This is a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. Volume 22 (1923-1924) was published with both US and UK locations on the volume title page, and we have seen US publisher locations or US dollar prices on some later issues.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Erica Lu for copyright research on this title.
